code: import React from"react";import Button from"@mui/material/Button";import Avatar from"../../../shared/components/Avatar";import Typography from"@mui/material/Typography";import OnlineIndicator from"./OnlineIndicator";import{chatTypes,getActions}from"../../../store/actions/chatActions";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FriendsListItem=_ref=>{let{id,username,isOnline,setChosenChatDetails}=_ref;const handleChooseActiveConversation=()=>{setChosenChatDetails({id:id,name:username},chatTypes.DIRECT);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{onClick:handleChooseActiveConversation,style:{width:"100%",height:"42px",marginTop:"10px",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"flex-start",textTransform:"none",color:"black",position:"relative"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{username:username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{style:{marginLeft:"7px",fontWeight:700,color:"#8e9297"},variant:"subtitle1",align:"left",children:username}),isOnline&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OnlineIndicator,{})]});};const mapActionsToProps=dispatch=>{return{...getActions(dispatch)};};export default connect(null,mapActionsToProps)(FriendsListItem);
